#summary notes for providing data to our systems
<wiki:toc max_depth="6" />

= Model data = 

The recommended method for sharing gridded model data is via a netCDF format, catalog enabled via THREDDS and map visualization enabled vi ncWMS

Sample associated organization and model metadata and links, thumbnails are listed below(maximum number of characters in parenthesis) - one row for each data variable/layer
